short_desc: Administrator side of Heymale Clone E-Commerce website, which handle administration task of Heymale Clone E-Commerce
long_desc: This project is a modified clone version of Heymale Official website. The creation of this project is for personal use only.
features: Performing out CRUD processes related to e-commerce administration
Handling order, starting from monitoring customer payments, confirming orders, until making delivery requests
Payment Gateway, administrators do not need to validate customer payments manually
Shipment API, allows and makes it easier for administrators to ship orders

short_desc: API Service that provide and support Heymale Clone Administrator run its functionality
